Sentencas: Inverse analysis is an efficient method to estimate parameters that characterizes a given system.
Titulo: Estimation of operating parameters of a SOFC integrated combined power cycle using differential evolution based inverse method

Sentencas: It offers lot of flexibility at the designer's hand in selecting the most suitable combination of parameters satisfying a given set of objective functions.
Titulo: Estimation of operating parameters of a SOFC integrated combined power cycle using differential evolution based inverse method

Sentencas: In this study, inverse analysis of a solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC)-gas turbine (GT)-steam turbine (ST) combined cycle (CC) power system is performed.
Titulo: Estimation of operating parameters of a SOFC integrated combined power cycle using differential evolution based inverse method

Sentencas: The system's net power, efficiencies (energy and exergy) and the total irreversibility at compressor pressure ratio (CPR) 6 and 14 are considered as objective functions for the inverse problem.
Titulo: Estimation of operating parameters of a SOFC integrated combined power cycle using differential evolution based inverse method

Sentencas: A differential evolution (DE) based inverse algorithm is used for simultaneously estimating six operating parameters of the plant.
Titulo: Estimation of operating parameters of a SOFC integrated combined power cycle using differential evolution based inverse method

Sentencas: It was seen that the inverse technique was very effective in estimating the operating parameters of a hybrid SOFC-GT-ST plant correctly within the prescribed lower and upper bound of the parameters.
Titulo: Estimation of operating parameters of a SOFC integrated combined power cycle using differential evolution based inverse method

Sentencas: Multiple combinations of parameters are obtained from the study and all these combinations of parameters satisfy the given single objective function/set of objective functions.
Titulo: Estimation of operating parameters of a SOFC integrated combined power cycle using differential evolution based inverse method

Sentencas: Any objective function value be set and then operating parameters be determined accordingly using the inverse method.
Titulo: Estimation of operating parameters of a SOFC integrated combined power cycle using differential evolution based inverse method

Sentencas: The results offer plenty of scope for selection of suitable operating parameters for the plant.
Titulo: Estimation of operating parameters of a SOFC integrated combined power cycle using differential evolution based inverse method
